title: Profile and optimize build pipeline
description: Build is 1.3x slower than competitor on comparable repos while indexing 5x more data. Profile: where does time go? Embedding vs extraction vs omendb store vs text indexing vs flush. Check batch size tuning, rayon parallelism for extraction, whether omendb store() can batch.

logs.msg: Benchmark baseline established: 69 files/801 blocks in 10.8s, 215 files/3356 blocks in 47s. ~71 blocks/s throughput. Build gap vs competitor narrowed on larger repos (1.3x vs 1.8x).

Release benchmarks (M3 Max, 118 blocks/23 files): Build: 2.1s (first run 30s due to ORT init). Search: 110ms. Build throughput: ~56 blocks/s. No obvious bottlenecks at this scale â€” ONNX inference dominates build time.
